committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest System lands in the state of Nevada, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands to the county of Douglas, Nevada, in exchange for certain lands to be conveyed by the county to the Secretary. Requires the county to construct a warehouse on the lands it conveys, and directs that such lands be added to the Toiyabe National Forest.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest System lands in the state of Nevada, and for other purposes.
